newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India's tender to buy Jan kerosene closes on Dec 5.
newsitem.headline: India's tender to buy Jan kerosene closes on Dec 5.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp's (IOC) tender to buy superior kerosene for arrival in January will close on December 5, traders said.
The tender seeks a 30,000-tonne cargo for delivery to Bombay on the Indian west coast, and a 45,000-tonne cargo for delivery to Madras or Haldia on the east coast.
The tender is valid until December 7.
In its last tender, IOC bought a 30,000-tonne cargo from Dutch trader Vitol at a $1.59 per-barrel premium over MidEast spot quotes, cost-and-freight (c-and-f) Bombay.
It also bought a 45,000-tonne cargo from Japanese trader, Tomen Corp at $2.44 per-barrel premium to MidEast quotes, c-and-f Madras or Haldia.
